mapper.select: select * from board_free where residence = #{residence} and residenceGu = #{residenceGu} order by board_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board_free(id, residence,residenceGu, content, image) values (#{id},#{residence},#{residenceGu}, #{content}, #{image})
mapper.update: update board_free set content =#{content} where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select * from comment_free where residence = #{residence} and residenceGu = #{residenceGu}
mapper.insert: insert into comment_free(boardnum, userid, comment, residence, residenceGu) values (#{boardnum},#{userid}, #{comment}, #{residence}, #{residenceGu})
